messageBody:
Recurrent testing with JUnit

Hello,

Was wondering if there exists a JUnit extension that allows JUnit to run tests every x minutes (every eg 30 minutes).
Preferable this would run in a JUnit GUI like junit.swingui.TestRunner, but with the option to check-enable repeatative testing, and specify an interval like every x minutes.

Repeatative testing is interesting to check a development that depends on several dependancies (legacy applications) that tend to change over time (eg go down, be modified, etc)

I experimented to implement/extend junit.swingui.TestRunner but without a lot of success so far.

Any suggestions are welcomed.
Thanks,

Dirk Lecluse
